opportunities.title: I-Startup 2024: Cards of Fate
opportunities.organizer: Liên Chi hội Đầu Tư - Trường Đại học Kinh tế Quốc dân
opportunities.description: I-Startup 2024 is a competition aimed at fostering creativity and entrepreneurship in students, providing mentorship, and supporting innovative projects across a variety of sectors.
opportunities.user: Liên Chi hội Đầu Tư - Trường Đại học Kinh tế Quốc dân

opportunities.title: Khởi nghiệp cùng Kawai 2024
opportunities.organizer: CLB Nhà Doanh nghiệp Tương lai - TEC FTU
opportunities.description: Khởi nghiệp cùng Kawai là cuộc thi ý tưởng khởi nghiệp thường niên, với sứ mệnh tìm kiếm những startup sáng tạo nhất, đồng thời cung cấp đào tạo và tư vấn chiến lược cho các đội thi.
opportunities.user: CLB Nhà Doanh nghiệp Tương lai - TEC FTU

opportunities.title: Social Business Creation 2024
opportunities.description: Social Business Creation is a global competition fostering innovative social business ideas with prizes up to 30,000 CAD and international learning opportunities.

opportunities.title: TECHSTART 2024
opportunities.organizer: Đại học Bách khoa Hà Nội
opportunities.description: TECHSTART 2024 is a tech-focused startup competition for students to pitch innovative ideas and receive mentorship, helping to shape sustainable solutions and impactful projects.
opportunities.user: Đại học Bách khoa Hà Nội

opportunities.title: Startup Wheel 2024
opportunities.description: Startup Wheel is a 6-month international startup competition providing opportunities for young entrepreneurs globally to pitch ideas, receive mentorship, and expand their businesses in Southeast Asia.

opportunities.title: Global Entreprep Incubator 2024
opportunities.description: Global Entreprep Incubator 2024 offers students and startups the chance to access funding, mentorship, and technologies developed by VinUniversity professors, with support from global mentors and industry leaders.

opportunities.title: Khởi Nghiệp Trẻ 2024
opportunities.description: Khởi Nghiệp Trẻ 2024 provides young entrepreneurs with the opportunity to pitch innovative business ideas, receive early feedback from experts, and compete for top positions in a dynamic, tech-driven environment.

opportunities.title: Vietnam Regional - Startup World Cup 2024
opportunities.organizer: Startup World Cup, Pegasus Tech Ventures
opportunities.description: Startup World Cup 2024's Vietnam Regional is a global competition where startups compete for a spot in the Grand Finale, with a chance to win $1,000,000 in investment.

opportunities.title: Shark Tank Vietnam 2024
opportunities.description: Shark Tank Vietnam is a reality TV show where entrepreneurs pitch their startups to investors for potential funding. It's a platform for raising capital and learning from seasoned investors.

opportunities.title: Cuộc thi Dự án Khởi nghiệp Xanh lần 10 – 2024
opportunities.organizer: Trung tâm Nghiên cứu Kinh doanh và Hỗ trợ Doanh nghiệp (BSA)
opportunities.description: Cuộc thi thúc đẩy các dự án khởi nghiệp trong nông nghiệp bền vững, bảo tồn văn hóa, và phát triển tài nguyên bản địa với tổng giải thưởng 967,000,000 VND.
opportunities.user: Trung tâm Nghiên cứu Kinh doanh và Hỗ trợ Doanh nghiệp (BSA)

opportunities.title: Social Innovation Launch 2024
opportunities.organizer: Trung tâm Việc làm và Khởi nghiệp Sinh viên - Đại học Đại Nam & YOUTH+
opportunities.description: Social Innovation Launch (SiL) 2024 is a social entrepreneurship competition aiming to foster ideas aligned with the 17 United Nations Sustainable Development Goals, offering students the opportunity to meet mentors and expand their networks.
opportunities.user: Trung tâm Việc làm và Khởi nghiệp Sinh viên - Đại học Đại Nam & YOUTH+

opportunities.title: GEFE Business Challenge 2024
opportunities.organizer: Business Startup Support Centre (BSSC) and EuroCham
opportunities.description: The GEFE Business Challenge 2024 brings together students to solve real-world sustainability challenges presented by leading companies, with mentorship and workshops.

opportunities.title: Google for Startups Accelerator: Southeast Asia
opportunities.organizer: Google, Vietnam National Innovation Center (NIC), U.S. Missions in Vietnam
opportunities.description: A three-month, equity-free accelerator program for AI startups based in Vietnam. The program connects startups with Google's products, people, and cloud infrastructure to scale AI-based solutions.
opportunities.prizeValue: Up to $350,000 in Google Cloud credits

opportunities.title: Future Business Analyst Season 4
opportunities.description: Future Business Analyst Season 4 is a nationwide competition focused on developing business resilience and leadership skills for young analysts through dynamic challenges and mentorship.

opportunities.title: Inno Vietnam-Japan Fast Track Pitch 2024
opportunities.organizer: Embassy of Japan in Vietnam, NTT Data, Viettel Cyber Security, VinAI, Phenikaa-X, SMC, WILLERS
opportunities.description: The Inno Vietnam-Japan Fast Track Pitch 2024 connects ASEAN and Japan's startup ecosystems, inviting proposals to tackle innovation challenges presented by leading companies, culminating in a final pitch event in Hanoi.

opportunities.title: Hành Trình Kinh Doanh 2024
opportunities.organizer: Câu lạc bộ Nhà Kinh tế trẻ (YEC-NEU)
opportunities.description: Hành Trình Kinh Doanh 2024 is a national business case competition for students to showcase their problem-solving skills and connect with leading companies.

opportunities.title: Road to MOA 2024
opportunities.description: Road to MOA 2024 is a marketing competition for students, featuring a two-phase format with Minicase Solution and a 48-hour Hackathon.

opportunities.title: REIvolution Ideas: HKU Vietnam Innovation Contest 2024
opportunities.description: This contest encourages young individuals to contribute innovative ideas in research, education, and social impact for HKU Vietnam, with opportunities to collaborate with HKU experts.
opportunities.prizeValue: VND 30,000,000 trip to HKU in Hong Kong, internships, scholarships

opportunities.title: R&D to Startup 2024
opportunities.organizer: Trung tâm Chuyển giao Tri thức và Hỗ trợ Khởi nghiệp, Đại học Quốc gia Hà Nội
opportunities.description: This competition fosters innovation in technology and entrepreneurship, offering mentorship, incubation, and potential international exposure for outstanding projects.
opportunities.prizeValue: Trips to Singapore or Hong Kong, angel investment
opportunities.user: Đại học Quốc gia Hà Nội

opportunities.title: Swin-Biz-Rockstar 2024
opportunities.description: Swin-Biz-Rockstar 2024 is a business idea competition aimed at fostering entrepreneurship by challenging participants to solve market problems with innovative technology-driven solutions in fields like Agritech, Healthtech, Edutech, and more.

opportunities.title: AIS4EE (Accelerating Innovative Start-ups for Energy Efficiency) 2024
opportunities.organizer: Global Green Growth Institute (GGGI), Ministry of Industry and Trade (MOIT)
opportunities.description: The AIS4EE accelerator program aims to scale innovative energy efficiency startups in Vietnam. It offers mentoring, training, and potential funding to help startups in sectors such as industry, transportation, and green buildings.
opportunities.prizeValue: $35,000 for startups and $10,000 for youth teams

opportunities.title: Sinh viên Tài năng Kinh doanh số 2024
opportunities.organizer: Hiệp hội Thương mại điện tử Việt Nam (VECOM)
opportunities.description: The competition fosters innovative digital business ideas, offering mentoring, internships, and access to top e-commerce companies in Vietnam. Winning teams can earn up to 50 million VND and other business-related benefits.

opportunities.title: Vietnam Social Innovation Challenge (VSIC) 2024
opportunities.description: VSIC 2024 is a national social innovation startup competition aimed at young entrepreneurs creating business models to address pressing social issues, aligned with the UN's Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

opportunities.title: AISTAR 2024
opportunities.description: AISTAR 2024 encourages innovative AI projects with applications in industries like healthcare, education, agriculture, and finance. Participants can receive training and exposure to key stakeholders in the public and private sectors.

opportunities.title: D-Prize Global Competition 2024
opportunities.description: D-Prize awards up to $20,000 to new social ventures that design solutions to scale the distribution of poverty-alleviation interventions. The competition focuses on proven models that can be scaled in low-income regions.

opportunities.title: Elevator Pitch Competition 2024 (EPiC)
opportunities.organizer: Hong Kong Science and Technology Parks Corporation (HKSTP)
opportunities.description: EPiC 2024 is an international startup competition where participants deliver a 60-second elevator pitch to judges, offering a platform for global startups to expand into Asia through exposure to investors and corporate partners.

opportunities.title: Imagine Cup 2024
opportunities.description: The Imagine Cup 2024 is a global competition focused on AI innovation and entrepreneurship, offering students the chance to develop and showcase technology-driven solutions to global challenges.
opportunities.prizeValue: $100,000 for the winner and $50,000 for two runners-up

opportunities.title: EIT Digital Champions 2024
opportunities.description: EIT Digital Champions 2024 is a competition designed to support European deep tech scaleups by providing access to Series A and B funding, mentorship, and international investor networks.

opportunities.title: Rice Business Plan Competition 2024
opportunities.organizer: Rice Alliance for Technology and Entrepreneurship
opportunities.description: The RBPC is the world’s largest and richest student startup competition, offering student founders the opportunity to pitch to investors, receive mentorship, and win over $1.5M in cash and prizes to advance their startups.

opportunities.title: Harvard Business School New Venture Competition 2024
opportunities.description: The HBS New Venture Competition (NVC) is an annual competition offering student and alumni entrepreneurs the chance to pitch business and social impact ventures, with prizes totaling $225,000.

opportunities.title: BIG Idea Challenge 2024
opportunities.organizer: NASA and National Institute of Aerospace (NIA)
opportunities.description: The 2024 BIG Idea Challenge invites university teams to design novel inflatable technologies for lunar operations, offering up to $150,000 in funding to develop their solutions.

opportunities.title: Hult Prize 2024 Challenge
opportunities.description: The Hult Prize 2024 is a global competition focused on creating sustainable and impactful startups, challenging participants to create viable ventures that solve critical social issues.

opportunities.title: Entrepreneurship World Cup 2024
opportunities.description: EWC 2024 is a global competition for startups of all stages, offering cash prizes, in-kind support, and mentorship to help entrepreneurs develop and scale their ideas.
opportunities.prizeValue: $1 million cash and $75 million in in-kind prizes

opportunities.title: Startup Wheel 2024 - International Track
opportunities.description: The International Track of Startup Wheel 2024 supports global startups looking to enter the Vietnamese market, offering networking, mentorship, and exposure to Southeast Asia's business ecosystem.

opportunities.title: Social Business Creation 2024
opportunities.description: SBC is a global competition focused on using market mechanisms to solve social challenges. Participants create profitable businesses with strong social impacts, receiving training and mentorship along the way.

opportunities.title: Creative Business Cup 2024
opportunities.description: The Creative Business Cup 2024 is a global competition for creative startups, offering participants a chance to pitch their innovative solutions to a global jury and network with investors from over 50 countries.
opportunities.prizeValue: EUR 200,000 in business services, mentoring, and prizes

opportunities.title: Inventures Startup Pitch Competition 2024
opportunities.description: The Inventures 2024 Startup Pitch Competition invites startups to pitch their innovative ideas across six program tracks to win a share of $150,000 in prizes and connect with a global audience of investors and business leaders.

opportunities.title: K-Startup Grand Challenge 2024
opportunities.organizer: Korea Institute of Startup & Entrepreneurship Development (KISED)
opportunities.description: K-Startup Grand Challenge 2024 is an accelerator program designed to support foreign startups in settling and growing their businesses in South Korea, providing mentorship, office space, and access to a vast network of investors.

opportunities.title: TechCrunch Startup Battlefield 2024
opportunities.description: Startup Battlefield is the premier startup competition held at TechCrunch Disrupt, bringing together top early-stage startups to pitch in front of investors and global tech leaders. Winners receive $100,000 and exposure.

opportunities.title: SCG Bangkok Business Challenge 2024
opportunities.description: The SCG Bangkok Business Challenge 2024 is a global student startup competition focused on encouraging entrepreneurship through sustainable and innovative ventures, offering teams the chance to pitch their business ideas to investors.

opportunities.title: Y Combinator 2024
opportunities.description: Y Combinator is a renowned startup accelerator that supports early-stage companies by providing mentorship, networking, and a $500,000 investment in exchange for 7% equity. YC's goal is to help startups grow and succeed.

opportunities.title: Slush 100 Startup Competition 2024
opportunities.description: Slush 100 is one of the most prestigious startup competitions globally, offering a €1 million equity investment for the winner and mentorship from top VCs such as General Catalyst and Cherry Ventures.

opportunities.title: Start Up Challenge 2024: CROSSNOVATION
opportunities.description: Start Up Challenge 2024 encourages international students in New South Wales to pitch innovative and sustainable business ideas, promoting entrepreneurship and economic cooperation between Vietnam and Australia.

opportunities.title: Startup World Cup Grand Finale 2024
opportunities.description: The Startup World Cup Grand Finale 2024 offers startups a chance to compete for a $1 million investment prize, connecting global entrepreneurs with top-tier investors and business leaders.

opportunities.title: Web Summit 2024
opportunities.description: Web Summit 2024 is one of the largest global tech conferences, featuring the ALPHA program for early-stage startups, networking with investors, and competitions such as PITCH, which gives startups the chance to compete for top recognition.

opportunities.title: 500 Global Flagship Accelerator 2024
opportunities.description: The 500 Global Flagship Accelerator offers a four-month program in Silicon Valley that provides $150,000 investment for a 6% stake. The program focuses on scaling startups through mentorship, growth strategies, and access to a global network.

opportunities.title: Next 36 Program 2024
opportunities.description: The Next 36 program helps aspiring Canadian entrepreneurs by offering mentorship, funding, and access to Canada's leading business network, transforming big ideas into scalable ventures.

opportunities.title: SXSW Pitch 2024
opportunities.description: The SXSW Pitch 2024 is an annual competition where early-stage startups from around the world present their innovative technology to a panel of judges and investors. Startups compete across various tech categories for cash prizes and exposure.

opportunities.title: Techstars Anywhere Accelerator 2024
opportunities.description: The Techstars Anywhere Accelerator is a remote-first, 13-week program that offers startups mentorship, funding of $120K, and networking opportunities with investors, while allowing participants to stay in their current location. The program includes three in-person meetups.

opportunities.title: JUMPSTARTER 2025
opportunities.description: JUMPSTARTER 2025 is a global startup competition focused on technology-driven startups that aim to impact industries while fulfilling UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). It offers up to $5 million in investment and high-impact networking opportunities.

opportunities.title: South Summit 2024
opportunities.description: South Summit 2024 is a global startup competition and conference, offering startups the opportunity to pitch innovative ideas, gain exposure to investors, and connect with industry leaders. It focuses on disruptive technologies across multiple industries.

opportunities.title: NVIDIA Inception Program 2024
opportunities.description: NVIDIA Inception is a free, no-equity accelerator program that provides startups with resources like GPU technology, deep learning credits, and connections to a vast network of venture capitalists and industry experts.
